price: 29. Ken baati makkinna Jibriil inki xongolót tekkeh akke waytek, usun too waqdi inkih Rabte baruuga yekken.
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūna
